metadata.description:
Loot Pod, is the first extension of your Space Pod Home. A marble canvas to display your most precious Metaverse loot. Designed by RTFKT and Jarlan Perez, powered by Cyber. Can be merged with the RTFKT Space Pod by owning both and accessing oncyber.io.

As part of the clone Exodus from planet 42 Draconis b, the Loot Pod is being transported within the LootPod Cruiser ship for the journey ahead. The LootPod Cruiser shipâ€™s hibernation chamber and gen8 pilot AI makes it perfect for long-distance missions. A LootPod Cruiser ship can cruise in style with a SpacePod A-Class ship docked to its side.

Digital Collectible terms and conditions apply, see https://rtfkt.com/legal-2D

While now in flight aboard the LootPod Cruiser ship, the immersive interior Loot Pod experience continues on with OnCyber, (https://oncyber.io) enabling Loot Pod 3D customization and exploration, alone or with friends.
metadata.name: RTFKT Loot Pod
